allow: Bash(cmd /c "call set-vsbt-env-x64.bat && call Add-MinGW-Path.cmd && echo Environment setup complete")

Bash(cmd /c "set-vsbt-env-x64.bat >nul 2>&1 && Add-MinGW-Path.cmd >nul 2>&1 && set WORKSPACE_FOLDER=D:\Users\tetsuo\Local\repos\doxygen-sample && cd prod\calc\libsrc\calc && make -f Makefile.Windows-poc")
